applepromotionconten.description: *Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers enrolling with Grand Rapids Energy between {{currentMonthFirstDay}} and {{currentMonthLastDay}} using applicable promotion code. GRE service is available for eligible customers participating in the Gas Customer Choice program through Consumers Energy. GRE rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.841.1541, write to Grand Rapids Energy, 400 Renaissance Center, Ste. 2600, Detroit, MI 48243 or visit grandrapidsenergy.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (6-Month plan: $25). Customer must have continuous active service with Grand Rapids Energy for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the Visa Reward Card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is the property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and is subject to the issuer's terms and conditions. Reward Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. All trademarks noted herein are held by their respective owners. Cannot be combined with any other offer.
